summary: Alyn Shir from Kingdom of Amalur game. She is in the Ragged Flaggon awaiting for an adventure.
descriptionHtml:
Alyn Shir from Kingdom of Amalur,

In the Ragged Flaggon.
Wearing Darkbrotherhood attire.
Duel wielding with Daedric Daggers.
Stealth Efficient.
Also true follower AI, if you part ways she will stay at her current location and use markers and furniture in the area.

Recommendations:
Alyn Shir Armor, by Jmenaru- for the true experience.

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23790/?

No requirments, except Skyrim- Enjoy
author: Jrew
